title: Greedy - Novel Updates
tags: Caring Protagonist   Charismatic Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Obsessive Love   Past Trauma   Possessive Characters   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Second Chance   Selfless Protagonist   Straight Uke   Suicides
author: 哔个蛋蛋
description:
This is a heartwarming rebirth story. The sick, sweet, affectionate, black belly shou finally captures the emotional defect and cool gong.

Lin Ruan: Zan, I love you.

Cheng Zan: Yes.

Lin Ruan: Whoever wants to snatch you from me, I will kill them.

Cheng Zan: Yes.

Lin Ruan: You… don’t hate me.

Cheng Zan glanced at Lin Ruan, lifted his chin, and pressed a kiss. Lin Ruan (blushing)……

Cheng Zan: You are such a weird person.>
